description.zh: 特斯拉和SpaceX的創始人，以其戰略思維和長遠規劃著稱

description.en: Actor, known for friendliness and team spirit

description.en: Actor and director, known for coolness and pragmatism

description.en: Martial artist and actor, known for focus and physical skills

description.en: Singer and entrepreneur, known for artistic talent and authenticity

description.en: King of Pop, known for artistic genius and sensitive nature

description.en: Singer, known for authentic personality and artistic expression

description.en: Famous writer, known for adventurous spirit and direct writing style

description.en: Former president and businessman, known for direct and decisive style

description.zh: 流行巨星，以其大膽和適應能力著稱
description.en: Pop superstar, known for boldness and adaptability

description.zh: 著名歌手，以其情感表達和親和力著稱
description.en: Famous singer, known for emotional expression and warmth

description.zh: 流行歌手，以其活力和與粉絲的互動著稱
description.en: Pop singer, known for energy and fan interaction

description.zh: 網球運動員，以其熱情和競爭精神著稱
description.en: Tennis player, known for passion and competitive spirit

description.zh: 富有想像力和戰略性的思想家，對一切事物都有計劃。
description.en: Imaginative and strategic thinkers, with a plan for everything.

description.zh: 創新的發明家，對知識有著永不滿足的渴望。
description.en: Innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.

description.zh: 大膽、富有想像力、意志強烈的領導者，總能找到或創造解決方法。
description.en: Bold, imaginative and strong-willed leaders, always finding a way – or making one.

description.zh: 聰明好奇的思想家，不會拒絕接受智力上的挑戰。
description.en: Smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge.

description.zh: 安靜而神秘，同時鼓舞他人的理想主義者。
description.en: Quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealists.

description.zh: 詩意、善良、利他，總是熱切地為正義事業服務。
description.en: Poetic, kind and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause.

description.zh: 富有魅力、鼓舞人心的領導者，能夠吸引聽眾。
description.en: Charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to mesmerize their listeners.

description.zh: 熱情、有創造力、社交能力強，總能找到微笑的理由。
description.en: Enthusiastic, creative and sociable free spirits, who can always find a reason to smile.

description.zh: 實際而注重事實的人，可靠性不容置疑。
description.en: Practical and fact-minded, reliability cannot be doubted.

description.zh: 非常專注、溫暖的守護者，隨時準備保護愛的人。
description.en: Very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones.

description.zh: 出色的管理者，在管理事物或人員方面無與倫比。
description.en: Excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things or people.

description.zh: 極具同情心、受歡迎、總是熱心助人。
description.en: Extraordinarily caring, social and popular people, always eager to help.

description.zh: 大膽而實際的實驗家，是各種工具的大師。
description.en: Bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools.

description.zh: 靈活、有魅力的藝術家，隨時準備探索新的可能性。
description.en: Flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore new possibilities.

description.zh: 聰明、精力充沛、善於感知的人，真正享受生活在邊緣。
description.en: Smart, energetic and very perceptive people, who truly enjoy living on the edge.

description.zh: 自發、精力充沛、熱情的人，生活對他們來說從不無聊。
description.en: Spontaneous, energetic and enthusiastic people – life is never boring around them.
